thread.section_title: Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, New York City - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Spring break
thread.title_full: Spring break - Review of Marriott Vacation Club Pulse, New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Danny B
title: Spring break
text:
It is being refurbished at the moment. It took time to get an elevator at times. The front desk staff are great friendly and great source of local information. It is a Marriott vacation club property so be ready for the sales pitch. The location is amazing walking distance to the Empire State Building. It is also walking distance to Times Square and Broadway.
The roof top bar is a bit price but well worth going up and taking pictures.
